title: Israel Says It Will Reopen Gaza-Egypt Border Crossing in Days
summary_full: The Rafah crossing will open at the end of Israel’s search for the remains of the last captive in Gaza.
summary_public: The Rafah crossing will open at the end of Israel’s search for the remains of the last captive in Gaza.
